Package fr.dawan.cfa2022.repositories

Interface EvaluationRepository

All Superinterfaces:
org.springframework.data.repository.CrudRepository<Evaluation,Long>, org.springframework.data.jpa.repository.JpaRepository<Evaluation,Long>, org.springframework.data.repository.PagingAndSortingRepository<Evaluation,Long>, org.springframework.data.repository.query.QueryByExampleExecutor<Evaluation>, org.springframework.data.repository.Repository<Evaluation,Long>
@Repository public interface EvaluationRepository extends org.springframework.data.jpa.repository.JpaRepository<Evaluation,Long>

  • Method Details

    • findAllByEtudiantId

      @Query("FROM Evaluation e WHERE e.etudiant.id= :etudiantId") List<Evaluation> findAllByEtudiantId(@Param("etudiantId") long etudiantId)

    • findAllByPromotionId

      @Query("FROM Evaluation e JOIN e.etudiant etu JOIN etu.promotions promo ON promo.id= :promotionId") List<Evaluation> findAllByPromotionId(@Param("promotionId") long promotionId)

    • getAvgByEtudiantIdAndPromotionId

      @Query("SELECT AVG(e.note) FROM Evaluation e JOIN e.etudiant etu ON etu.id = :etudiantId JOIN etu.promotions p ON p.id = :promotionId") double getAvgByEtudiantIdAndPromotionId(@Param("etudiantId") long etudiantId, @Param("promotionId") long promotionId)

    • getAvgByPromotionId

      @Query("SELECT AVG(e.note) FROM Evaluation e JOIN e.etudiant etu JOIN etu.promotions promo WHERE promo.id= :promotionId") double getAvgByPromotionId(@Param("promotionId") long promotionId)

    • getAvgByPromotionIdAndBlocDeCompetences

      @Query("SELECT AVG(e.note) FROM Evaluation e JOIN e.epreuve ep JOIN ep.blocCompetences bc JOIN e.etudiant etu JOIN etu.promotions promo WHERE promo.id = :promotionId AND bc.id = :bcId") double getAvgByPromotionIdAndBlocDeCompetences(@Param("bcId") long bcId, @Param("promotionId") long promotionId)

    • getAvgByEtudiantIdAndBlocCompId

      @Query("SELECT AVG(e.note) FROM Evaluation e JOIN e.etudiant etu WHERE etu.id= :etudiantId AND e.epreuve.blocCompetences.id = :blocCompetencesId") double getAvgByEtudiantIdAndBlocCompId(@Param("etudiantId") long etudiantId, @Param("blocCompetencesId") long blocCompetencesId)
